Add/Replace/Delete.Description: The ADD/Delete/Replace modifiers are used in a definition to Add/Delete/Replace an attribute to the Definition.
Add/Replace/Delete.Name: Add/Replace/Delete

List.Description: This attribute specifies a string and its respective identifier in the Name Set.
List.Name: List

Localise.Description: This sets the localisation flag. If enabled, any functions that access Name Set strings will be marked for localisation (to currently selected UI language).
Localise.Name: Localise

Use.Description: The USE keyword is used in a definition to reuse an existing definition.
Use.Name: Use
